entry.data:
CLEAR LATE THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 50 PERCENT

FREEZING RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY
FREEZING RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AND FREEZING RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEW LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 10 TO 15
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
